tasks.label: ruff
tasks.command: source ${HOME}/.zshrc; conda activate base; ruff check --fix ${file}; ruff format ${file}

tasks.label: git-sync
tasks.command: git fetch origin --prune && (git fetch origin main:main 2>/dev/null; true)

tasks.label: git-rebase-onto-main
tasks.command: git stash push -q -m 'git-rebase-auto' --include-untracked; git rebase main; git stash list | head -1 | grep -q 'git-rebase-auto' && git stash pop -q
